title: Arkansas health officials concerned as Delta variant continues to spread
author: Parris Kane
description: As the vaccination rate remains low in Arkansas, the Delta variant continues to spread across the state. Health officials are growing increasingly concerned as hospitalizations start reaching new highs. Dr. Steppe Mette, chief executive officer of UAMS, fears if we don't get a handle on these variants, the hospitals may be back to where they were over winter during the last COVID-19 peak.

Arkansas health officials say they are concerned over the spread of the Delta variant in the state.
